files.description: Setup script for the Quran search application. Uses setuptools to configure package details, version, packages, and installation requirements.
List of package requirements for the Quran search application. Currently empty, serving as a placeholder for future dependencies.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Contains functions to read, parse, and return Quran verses as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file and parses each line formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

functions.name: load_quran_data
functions.description: Alias for load_quran_text, providing backward compatibility for loading Quran data.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: This module provides various functions to search and analyze Quran data. It includes utilities for word and phrase searches, counting occurrences, and filtering verses by ranges and surah numbers. The functions support both case-sensitive and case-insensitive operations.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses by iterating over provided Quran data and checking if the search word is present. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. Returns verses that contain the given phrase, with an option for case-sensitive or case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data by filtering verses based on surah number and matching the word in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the specified Surah.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to limit the search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a specific word group in a given Surah by filtering the verses by surah number and then checking for the phrase using the specified case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a given word in the entire Quran data using a case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to count within the Quran data.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran data using case-insensitive matching.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to count occurrences of in the Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran data within a specified verse range. The range is defined by start and end tuples representing (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for within the verse range.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: A tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the starting verse.

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: A tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the ending verse.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word group in the Quran data within a specified verse range. Returns verses where the word group is found, taking into account case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for within the verse range.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: A tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the starting verse.

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: A tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the ending verse.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Search for Quran verses that contain exactly the specified number of words. Splits each verse's text into words and filters verses based on the count.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words a verse should contain.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the number of words is a multiple of the provided number. Raises a ValueError if the provided multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The number which the verse word count should be a multiple of.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function that loads Quran data, performs search operations, and prints the results to the console.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.

Unit tests for the Quran search functions defined in src/quran_search.py. This file covers various scenarios including case sensitivity, word and phrase searches, word count validations, and range-based verse searches. It also tests functionality from the Quran data loader.
